actions.name: CreateDeliveryStream
actions.description: Grants permission to create a delivery stream

actions.name: DeleteDeliveryStream
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery stream and its data

actions.name: DescribeDeliveryStream
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the specified delivery stream and gets the status

actions.name: ListDeliveryStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to list your delivery streams

actions.name: ListTagsForDeliveryStream
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified delivery stream

actions.name: PutRecord
actions.description: Grants permission to write a single data record into an Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream

actions.name: PutRecordBatch
actions.description: Grants permission to write multiple data records into a delivery stream in a single call, which can achieve higher throughput per producer than when writing single records

actions.name: StartDeliveryStreamEncryption
actions.description: Grants permission to enable server-side encryption (SSE) for the delivery stream

actions.name: StopDeliveryStreamEncryption
actions.description: Grants permission to disable the specified destination of the specified delivery stream

actions.name: TagDeliveryStream
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for the specified delivery stream

actions.name: UntagDeliveryStream
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified delivery stream

actions.name: UpdateDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to update the specified destination of the specified delivery stream
